item.description:
Dungeon

 

Command!

 

 

Dungeon Command is a head-to-head miniatures skirmish game for 2-4 players. You are playing as the commander of your warband, intent on routing your opponent’s warband from the battlefield. A game of Dungeon Command normally takes about 60 minutes to play.

Each Faction pack contains a customizable single player warband with 12 pre-painted plastic miniatures, 12 Creature cards, and 36 Order cards to command those creatures with.

 

This event requires that you bring a copy of Dungeon Command with you to play. Some players may bring an extra box and if they are willing to lend it out that is fine. We will try and teach anyone how to play their boxed set if they have never played before and for the experienced players we will try to match you up with another experienced player to play against. The store has received a few promo cards and one will be given out to each winner of the game and possibly one for the  non-winners if there are extras. You may bring any boxed set to play.

 

The following week (on Wednesday April 17) we will be starting the next season of D&D Encounters - Storm Over Neverwinter. For this coming season you need to either create a 3rd level character of any official 4th edition Living Forgotten Realms (LFR) race and class or you may bring in your character that you played in the older Neverwinter Encounter season. Each character will have 3 magic items. One each of levels 4, 3 and 2 or lower levels and 680 gold to spend on other items, only two of which may be consumable.  It is extremely important that you try to make use of a character theme based in Neverwinter.
item.name: Dungeon Command!
